title: Disney Adult Glitz Analog Quartz CZ Bracelet Watch
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED DISNEY WATCH- For the Disney Lover, this Offically Licensed Disney Watch features fan favorite beloved characters straight from Disney movies

EXCEPTIONALLY DESIGNED- Our timepieces were designed to stay simply classic yet dressy with a stone CZ bezel, and matching CZ stones on the bracelet as well. This beautiful watch is suitable to be worn for business, night out, or for everyday use. Case diameter measures 40mm and bracelet size of 20mm.

QUALITY MATERIALS- Crafted with the highest quality material for the case and strap with a precise Japanese Quartz Movement for accurate time keeping. This watch also features a scratch-resistant mineral crystal to help protect your timepiece.
WATER RESISTANT- Up to 30 meters (100ft), meaning safe to wear in the rain or get splashed. DO NOT recommend wearing it when bathing, swimming, diving, etc.

PERFECT GIFT- Whether for yourself or a Disney Fan, this is the perfect gift to invoke your most favorite character memories. Great for graduation, birthday, anniversary, retirement or any special occasion.
description: Disney Mickey Mouse Women's Gold Alloy Glitz Watch, Gold Case with Stone Bezel, Silver Stainless Steel Bracelet, Case diameter measures 40mm and bracelet size of 20mm. Dial Features Mickey Mouse. Mineral glass crystal, stainless steel case back, Japan quartz movement, water resistance to 100 feet.

Keep track of time with this officially licensed Disney Women's CZ Bracelet Watch by Ewatchfactory on your wrist. The timepiece displays artwork from your favorite Disney character on the face, and is designed with labeled "hour" and "minute" hands to help young ones learn how to tell time. This classic watch has a polished and matte steel finish and a precision Japan movement for accurate time keeping and a 1 year manufacturer warranty.
